change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 231/2015, effective April 1, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Subject to any applicable fees set by the administrative authority, a person must submit the following licence application fee with the person's application for a licence:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: subject to paragraph (b), if the application is for a licence for a principal location, a fee of $325;
if the application is for a renewal of a licence for a principal location and the gross annual collections of the applicant total

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: $250 000 or more but less than $500 000, a fee of $500,
$500 000 or more but less than $1 000 000, a fee of $1 000, or

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: if the application is for a licence for a location other than the principal location, a fee of $300;
subject to paragraph (e), if the applicant is employed by a licensee, a fee of $125;
if the application is for a renewal of a licence and the applicant is employed by a licensee, a fee of $100.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of subsection (1), if an applicant carries on business at only one location in British Columbia, that location is the applicant's principal location.
